about_the_game:
"Screech" is a puzzle platformer where you play as Astrix, a gifted student accepted into "The Academy." Unveil the secrets hidden within its aging walls and solve the mysteries that have left the institution in ruin.

Use a mysterious compass to travel between the past and present, helping Astrix uncover the strange events that wrecked The Academy. Solve intricate puzzles by manipulating time to alter reality.

Dive deep into the story of The Academy, meeting its enigmatic headmaster, The O.W.L., and his notable students, Leon and Wren. Discover their dark secrets and the tragic events that shaped their fates.

Witness the tale of The Academy unfold from an outsider's perspective and make decisions that seem to impact the world permanently.

Find gears and shards scattered throughout The Academy to progress through the story. Unlock the power of the Library Hub's machine to achieve a "Screech," a process that captures and stores the knowledge of everyone caught in a reflection.

Explore the hauntingly beautiful environment of The Academy, with stunning visuals and an eerie soundtrack that will keep you on edge.

Can you navigate the trials and tribulations laid throughout The Academy and unlock its deepest secrets? Join Astrix in "Screech" and embark on an unforgettable adventure.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11

short_description: In "Screech," play as Astrix, exploring The Academy's secrets. Use a compass to travel through time, solve puzzles, and uncover the past. Collect gears and shards to activate a machine that captures knowledge in a "Screech." Discover the mysteries in this captivating puzzle platformer.
